  1. Jason Mayes Retweeted
    Jon Henshaw
    ✔         @henshaw

    Here's what @comcast removed from their Net Neutrality page. They no longer promise to:

    -Not throttle back the speed at which content comes to you
    -Not prioritize Internet traffic or create paid fast lanes
    -Make internet accessible to low income familieshttp://corporate.comcast.com/openinternet/open-net-neutrality …

  4. Jason Mayes @jason_mayes

    Managed to make it to the end of the #ML101 deck I posted recently? If so you may like this example I also made that implements a multilayered perceptron in #JavaScript to classify digits: https://codepen.io/jasonmayes/pen/POoZOG … Play with it in your browser! #ML #DeepLearning #MachineLearning

    Multi Layer Perceptron Neural Network classifying MNIST in JS

    This demo shows how you can create a relatively simple deep neural network (a multi layer perceptron) that can learn how to recognize handwritten digit...
